content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) waiting for source items

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-11.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0) with a warning of no ingredients to smelt

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-9.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0) with a warning of no ingredients to smelt

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to insufficient inventory for insertion
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to insert items into furnaces or other entities.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that the inserters have access to the necessary items from the source entities.

### Errors when chests are full
- Regularly clear out or manage the inventory of chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full chests.
